readSettings

public void readSettings()
Reads the settings file (located at SETTINGS_FILE_PATH) and sets variable "path" with the configuration found in this file if the file doesn't exist, will ask the user to set the "path" by running method askUserToSetPath()

See Also:
File, SETTINGS_FILE_PATH

private void init()

askUserToSetPath

private void askUserToSetPath()
Opens a JFileChooser that asks the user to choose a directory that contains git repositories. this sets the "path" variable using the setNewPath() method.

See Also:
JFileChooser

setNewPath

private void setNewPath(java.lang.String _path)
Sets the variable "path" to _path

Parameters:
_path - the filesystem path
